The energy release is very large in such a runaway reaction.But such conditions are not possible to replicate on Earth, and thankfully so.Instead all designs for fusion reactors operate in regimes of far smaller density than exists in the core of the Sun even, where a runaway reaction is prevented because of the hydrodynamic factors that I mentioned above.
